attributes.action: Restrict the time that contracts can be signed to the length of parliament.
attributes.additional_details: Situations change and we are tied to long contracts which are no longer relevant
attributes.background: It seems that parliament locks us into long contracts and a new government is tied to them. It’s not an efficient way of spending tax money.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.  

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do - we're not sure which contracts you would like this to apply to.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
